name: Afnan: The Desert Girl
description:
Afnan : Desert Girl   is a platforming game made with Unity. If you've got questions about it, Please Contact Me. 

The game contain 11 levels that different types of obstacles for prototyping. There is an original character with original animation and multiple abilities. 

Art :   Original character with original animation. Modified Background image and tile set. Multiple assets from the Unity store, craftpix.net and opengameart.org

Music : Desert Adventure Audio Pack by Jake South. Desert Night - Seamless Loop by Olan. EasternArcticDubstep by Vishwa Jay.  AlmostDeserted by Tine Schenck. Sandy Postage by Trevor Lentz. Desert Dance by Michael Robinson Homingstar. (Cinematic) Arabian Princess by Clement Panchout. 

Created by Afnan

Afnan : Desert Girl  is (C) 2021 by Afnan
